content.rendered:
[vc_row center_row=”yes”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”10406″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1643971725586{margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

OUR SERVICES

Tile Marble Fixing

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]We are specialist suppliers fixers and restorers of marble, granite, slate, limestone, quartz, york stone etc for all types of flooring including treads, risers etc…
We can supply mass produced tiles or we can cut and shape tiles from slab to give you that bespoke job to fit your sizes and requirements bearing in mind that bespoke from slab is more expensive. Floors can be to a pattern and be with or without borders. If you want supply only that is not a problem or we can do your cutting, shaping in our factory at extra cost if you require this service.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row center_row=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1618469762389{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1618474037539{margin-top: -20px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”sz”]

Darlak Fixing, Marble Fixing, Tile Fixing, New Washroom Fixing

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”10575″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”10569″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
